title: The best 4th of July TV sales and deals 2021: save on 4K, QLED and OLED TVs
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: 4th of July TV sales from Best Buy, Walmart, and Amazon
article: 4th of July TV sales are still ongoing today, even though we've passed the calendar date itself - with a ton of top retailers still battling out for the best prices. Walmart, Best Buy, and Amazon are just a few of them, and we've got some handy recommendations on everything from cheap 32-inch TVs all the way to premium 4K OLED displays just down below. We're seeing some of the lowest prices all year so far with these 4th of July TV sales, making it a great opportunity to save more than a few bucks on a new set. While the biggest (and juiciest) price cuts appear to be on the more premium and larger TVs from brands like Sony and Samsung, there are in fact some really great budget options today. So, regardless of whether you're simply looking for a backup for the bedroom or a hefty upgrade in the living room, you'll find plenty to check out. We've listed the best 4th of July TV sales from your favorite retailers below, followed by the top deals, which are categorized by size to help narrow down your decision. We'll be updating this page with all the latest offers throughout the holiday weekend, and if you're looking for other Independence Day offers, you can see our 4th of July sales guide, which includes bargains on appliances, mattresses, laptops, and more.

You can see more offers with our guide to the best cheap TV deals and sales that are happening right now. You can also shop for more bargains with our roundup of the Walmart 4th of July sale and snag a discount at the 4th of July mattress sale event.
